<title>DG Studio - Case Study | Thai Ginger</title>
<meta name="description" content="Thai Ginger is a Thai food restaurant chain in Seattle, serving authentic Thai food. They asked us to reflect their brand online and make their menu visually available. The site also needed to provide online ordering for each of their four locations." />
